comment: She's extremely easy. online tests over readings, which you have two attempts. After the 1st attempt, look to see which was right and wrong and then retake. Easy A! powerpoint presentation and an essay, which everyone who turned it in on time got a 100. Late? Still an A. She doesn't require the voluntary work that other KSU 1101 classes must do
she is kind of hard to understand at times. she is a nice lady, but the class is kind of stupid. her grades are easy but kind of seem tedious. she is a nice lady but i didnt like the class
